# klevu-product-query



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Klevu Product Query application that shows a popup for asking questions about a product

## Properties

| Property               | Attribute                | Description                                                                         | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | Default                                                                                         |
